summary: In the tradition of classic westerns, a narrator sets up the story of a lone gunslinger who walks into a saloon. However, the people in this saloon can hear the narrator and the narrator may just be a little bit bloodthirsty.
cast: Shawn Parsons|Scott Beehner|Brace Harris|Eileen O'Connell|Jordan Black|Timothy Brennen|Travis Lincoln Cox|Schoen Hodges|Circus-Szalewski|Chet Nelson|Keith Biondi|Nick Offerman
title: The Gunfighter
